Title: RAM
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Nic Van Zeebroeck, Michael Sopczynski, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story), Michael Sopczynski (story)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Some of the secrets of Finch's operation before he enlisted the help of Reese are about to be revealed, it will also include some shocking ties to some of the stuff that has happened in present-day events.
